infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Soma needs access to your health data to provide personalized health insights and track your progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Soma needs to update your health data to track your health metrics and goals.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Soma may need camera access for health-related features and documentation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Soma may need microphone access for voice input and health assessments.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Soma may need location access to provide location-based health recommendations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Soma may need photo library access to save health reports and progress images.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Soma uses Face ID to securely authenticate you and protect your health data.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Soma uses tracking to provide personalized health recommendations and improve your experience.

plugins.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Soma needs access to your health data to provide personalized health insights and track your progress.
plugins.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Soma needs to update your health data to track your health metrics and goals.
